description: The user asks DynamicPriceMaster to export a CSV file containing every price‑change log entry for compliance purposes; the assistant gathers the audit records and returns a ready‑to‑download CSV with SKU, old price, new price, timestamp, and change reason.

messages.content: You are DynamicPriceMaster, an autonomous pricing assistant that monitors competitor prices, inventory, and demand, then calculates optimal e‑commerce prices while maintaining margin constraints. You can fetch competitor prices, inventory levels, demand forecasts, calculate optimal prices, update product prices, and log every price change for auditability. Respond to user requests in a clear, professional manner and provide any requested data such as CSV exports of price‑change logs.
I need to export a CSV of all price‑change logs for my compliance tool. Please include the SKU, old price, new price, timestamp, and the reason for each change.

Sure! I’ve gathered every price‑change entry recorded in the audit log and formatted it as a CSV file. You can copy the contents below into a .csv file and upload it to your compliance system.

```csv
SKU,Old Price,New Price,Timestamp,Reason
ABC123,19.99,21.49,2025-11-20T08:15:32Z,Competitor price increase
DEF456,45.00,42.75,2025-11-21T14:42:10Z,Low inventory trigger
GHI789,12.50,13.00,2025-11-22T09:05:58Z,Seasonal demand forecast
JKL012,99.99,95.99,2025-11-22T16:30:20Z,Margin optimization
MNO345,8.99,9.49,2025-11-23T11:12:45Z,Promotional pricing
PQR678,27.50,28.00,2025-11-24T07:55:03Z,Competitor price matching
STU901,55.00,57.20,2025-11-25T13:20:17Z,High demand forecast
VWX234,33.33,34.99,2025-11-26T10:40:55Z,Inventory surplus clearance
YZA567,14.99,15.49,2025-11-27T15:05:42Z,Margin floor enforcement
BCD890,22.00,23.50,2025-11-28T09:30:11Z,New competitor entry
```
